name: oxygenide
@comment dependencies: axios is a peer dependency of soap. it needs to be included to avoid 'npm ls' failing due to missing deps
triple-beam is a dep of winston and new version 1.4 requires node >= 14. thus we include it explicitly and pin to 1.3.0.
@comment dev dependencies: typescript is a peer dependency of wdio. it needs to be included to avoid 'npm ls' failing due to missing deps. and since we don't actually need it, it can be included as dev dep.
